001package edu.pdx.cs410J.grader;
002
003import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test;
004
005import static org.hamcrest.MatcherAssert.assertThat;
006import static org.hamcrest.Matchers.*;
007
008public class SurveyTest {
009  @Test
010  public void setNonEmptyValue() {
011    Student student = new Student("test");
012    String nonEmptyFirstName = "firstName";
013
014    Survey.setValueIfNotEmpty(nonEmptyFirstName, student::setFirstName);
015
016    assertThat(student.getFirstName(), equalTo(nonEmptyFirstName));
017  }
018
019  @Test
020  public void setNullValue() {
021    Student student = new Student("test");
022    String nonNullValue = "nonNullValue";
023    student.setFirstName(nonNullValue);
024
025    Survey.setValueIfNotEmpty(null, student::setFirstName);
026
027    assertThat(student.getFirstName(), equalTo(nonNullValue));
028  }
029
030  @Test
031  public void setEmptyValue() {
032    Student student = new Student("test");
033    String nonEmptyValue = "nonEmptyValue";
034    student.setFirstName(nonEmptyValue);
035
036    Survey.setValueIfNotEmpty("", student::setFirstName);
037
038    assertThat(student.getFirstName(), equalTo(nonEmptyValue));
039  }
040
041  @Test
042  public void longMessageIsBrokenInto80CharacterLines() {
043    String message = "This is a long sentence that contains more than 80 characters. " +
044      "Somewhere in here it should be broken into multiple lines of 80 characters each.";
045
046    String lines = Survey.breakUpInto80CharacterLines(message);
047
048    assertThat(lines, not(startsWith(" ")));
049    assertThat(lines, containsString("here\nit"));
050  }
051
052  @Test
053  public void validEmailAddressIsValid() {
054    String address = "whitlock@cs.pdx.edu";
055    assertThat(Survey.isEmailAddress(address), equalTo(true));
056  }
057
058  @Test
059  public void invalidEmailAddressIsInvalid() {
060    String address = "whitlock";
061    assertThat(Survey.isEmailAddress(address), equalTo(false));
062  }
063
064}
